member.name: CMSG_CTRL_DEL_SIGNER_UNAUTH_ATTR_PARA
member.summary: The CMSG_CTRL_DEL_SIGNER_UNAUTH_ATTR_PARA structure is used to delete an unauthenticated attribute of a signer of a signed message. This structure is passed to if the dwCrlType parameter is CMSG_CTRL_DEL_SIGNER_UNAUTH_ATTR.

member.name: CMSG_CTRL_DEL_SIGNER_UNAUTH_ATTR_PARA.cbSize
member.summary: Size of this structure in bytes.

member.name: CMSG_CTRL_DEL_SIGNER_UNAUTH_ATTR_PARA.dwSignerIndex
member.summary: Index of the signer in the rgSigners array of pointers to structures in a signed message's structure. The unauthenticated attribute for this signer is deleted.

member.name: CMSG_CTRL_DEL_SIGNER_UNAUTH_ATTR_PARA.dwUnauthAttrIndex
member.summary: Index of the element in the rgUnauthAttr array of the structure holding the unauthenticated attribute to be removed.
